cn.trackCensoredName: UPDF - 新一代 AI 智能 PDF 编辑器
cn.trackName: UPDF - 新一代 AI 智能 PDF 编辑器
cn.releaseNotes:
- AI 对话功能现已支持显示 LaTeX 公式。
- 支持将其他格式文件拖拽至编辑器以创建 PDF 文档。
- 支持隐藏工具栏操作，让界面更简洁。
- UPDF AI 在生成思维导图时，现已支持开启深度思考模式。
- PDF 转换插件已完成升级，转换效果得到进一步提升。
- 修复了部分产品问题，改进并提升了产品性能和稳定性。
cn.description:
UPDF 2.0大版本更新，这是一款AI PDF编辑器，具有AI，阅读，编辑，注释、云同步、转换、加密、裁剪、拆分、文档对比等功能。1个账号付费，全平台都可以使用（电脑＋手机＋iPad）。UPDF 凭借年轻化高颜值的界面设计让你拥有一个愉快轻松的阅读和办公体验。
主要功能：
1. 编辑 PDF
-你可以添加或者删除文本，编辑文本属性和格式，比如字体，颜色，大小等。
-UPDF 也支持通过修改文本的对齐方式使您的文档看起来更整洁。
-对于 PDF里的图片，你可以进行裁剪，旋转，替换，提取，删除等操作。
-你可以直接通过拖拽添加和替换图片。
-支持添加、删除、和编辑水印、背景、以及页眉页脚。

2. AI 功能
-对单个或多个PDF文档进行总结。
-对 PDF 文档进行全文翻译。
-对 PDF文档进行解释，润色或编写。
-与 UPDF AI 自由对话。
-支持与图片进行自由问答。
-支持将文档总结生成思维导图。

3. 注释 PDF
-在阅读 PDF 文档的过程中，你可以对文档内容添加注释，比如高亮，下划线，删除线来标注突出重点内容。
-你也可以通过添加图形和文本框来注释你的PDF 文档。
-如果需要对某些内容进行注解，你可以在文档任意位置添加便签来输入笔记或者审批意见等。
-你可以在文档中添加并旋转各种各样的签章和贴纸用以注释和评论。
-若需要在文档里签名，你也可以直接快速地创建你的签名。
-通过注释列表一键查看或删除所有注释内容。

4.OCR（光学字符识别）（仅适用于官网下载的版本）
-将扫描的 PDF 转换为可搜索和可编辑的PDF。
-支持可根据选择检测的38种语言。
-将可搜索和可编辑的PDF 转换为纯图像PDF。

5. 转换 PDF
-你可以将 PDF转换为 Word，Excel，PowerPoint，Image，HTML，Text，CSV，XML，PDFIA等格式。
-将 Word，Excel，PowerPoint，图片，CAJ转成PDF。
-转换之后的文档会保持原文档格式不变。

6. 云同步
-支持上传文档至 UPDF Cloud，实现 PC+移动端全平合同步。

7. 管理 PDF 页面
-对于页面布局，你可以通过旋转调整页面方向，通过拖拽页面调整页面顺序。
-如果你需要文档中的某些页面，你可以直接提取它们；另外，当你不需要某个页面时，也可以直接删除它。
-你可以添加空白页或者从其他文件中添加页面。
-你也可以快速替换文档中的页面。
-快速根据页码拆分一个 PDF文档为多个文档。
-根据需要自定义裁剪页面大小。

8. 浏览和定位 PDF 文档
-你可以放大或缩小页面，清晰地浏览文档内容。
-通过在页面添加书签，快速定位找到需要的页面。
-如果你需要同时查看多个 PDF 文档，不用在另外的窗口打开阅览它们，你可以在同一窗日多个标签打开预览，这样更简单快捷。
-想要快速找到某文本内容，可以一键搜索查找定位文本。
-快速通过缩略图旋转，删除，旋转和打印 PDF 页面。
-通过幻灯片的形式攝放 PDF文档。

9. 保护文档
-可添加文档打开密码防止末经授权的用户打开。
-可设置文档功能权限控制密码，限制其他用户打印、編辑、复制 PDF 文档等。
-支持两个文档进行对比，查看不同之处。
-数字签名，防止他人篡改文件内容。
-支持马赛克（密文）重要信息。

10. 创建 PDF
-创建空白页。
-从选区、窗口、或屏幕捕捉创建 PDF。

11. 扁平化 PDF
-快速扁平化 PDE，压平文档中的图层。

12. 批量处理
-支持批量转换，合并，OCR，压缩，打印，创建，水印，页眉页脚，贝茨编码，插入，背景，加密，删除。

-你可以将 PDF转换为 Word，Excel，PowerPoint，Image，HTML，Text，CSV，XML，PDFIA等格式。
-将 Word，Excel，PowerPoint，图片，CAJ转成PDF。
-转换之后的文档会保持原文档格式不变。

6. 云同步
-支持上传文档至 UPDF Cloud，实现 PC+移动端全平合同步。

7. 管理 PDF 页面
-对于页面布局，你可以通过旋转调整页面方向，通过拖拽页面调整页面顺序。
-如果你需要文档中的某些页面，你可以直接提取它们；另外，当你不需要某个页面时，也可以直接删除它。
-你可以添加空白页或者从其他文件中添加页面。
-你也可以快速替换文档中的页面。
-快速根据页码拆分一个 PDF文档为多个文档。
-根据需要自定义裁剪页面大小。

8. 浏览和定位 PDF 文档
-你可以放大或缩小页面，清晰地浏览文档内容。
-通过在页面添加书签，快速定位找到需要的页面。
-如果你需要同时查看多个 PDF 文档，不用在另外的窗口打开阅览它们，你可以在同一窗日多个标签打开预览，这样更简单快捷。
-想要快速找到某文本内容，可以一键搜索查找定位文本。
-快速通过缩略图旋转，删除，旋转和打印 PDF 页面。
-通过幻灯片的形式攝放 PDF文档。

9. 保护文档
-可添加文档打开密码防止末经授权的用户打开。
-可设置文档功能权限控制密码，限制其他用户打印、編辑、复制 PDF 文档等。
-支持两个文档进行对比，查看不同之处。
-数字签名，防止他人篡改文件内容。
-支持马赛克（密文）重要信息。

10. 创建 PDF
-创建空白页。
-从选区、窗口、或屏幕捕捉创建 PDF。

11. 扁平化 PDF
-快速扁平化 PDE，压平文档中的图层。

12. 批量处理
-支持批量转换，合并，OCR，压缩，打印，创建，水印，页眉页脚，贝茨编码，插入，背景，加密，删除。

Visual Cue Pro is an advanced, easy-to-use audio player for iOS and iPadOS.

Main Features:
• Waveform view for visual seeking and setting up cue points
• Zoom functionality for more precise seeking on longer waveforms
• Caches waveforms for fast display
• Supports unlimited cue points per file
• Quickly switch between cue points across multiple audio files
• Does not alter your precious source files in any way
• Drag & drop files directly from Files and other apps
• Designed for speed and efficiency
• GPU-based waveform renderer
• Supports Dark Mode

Collections:
• Import files from Files using drag & drop
• Manage your music library
• Create cue points within each item

Playlists:
• Import files from Collections using drag & drop (cue points included)
• Import files from Files using drag & drop (without cue points)
• Create cue points within each item (shared across playlists if the item is from a Collection)
• Reorder items using drag & drop in your desired order

For Music Producers:
• Manage your library of reference tracks to compare with your own
• Quickly jump between cue points in your reference tracks
• Manage and listen to your own tracks
• Organize production elements and recorded source material

For DJs:
• Manage your library of tracks
• Set up cue points in your tracks
• Compile DJ sets by quickly jumping between cue points in different tracks
• Manage and listen to your own mixes
• Bookmark tracks in other DJs’ sets and discover new music faster

Visual Cue Pro is an offline music player, music library manager, and music organizer with lossless playback, widely used in sound studios, by music directors, A&R, and for audio transcribing. It's also perfect for venues, theaters, churches, DJs, and more! It features full-screen support, native Apple Silicon support, Dark Mode, and cloud drive compatibility. The best reliable alternative to iTunes, plays audio files and formats supported by macOS, including WAV, AIFF, FLAC, MP3, M4A, and more.

Free to download and try. Purchase modules via in-app purchase (subscriptions or lifetime permanent license).

If you have a Mac, check out the macOS version too, which offers even more functionality!

- UI improvements.

Your feedback is highly appreciated. If you have any issues, questions or suggestions please contact us by sending an email to contact@guitargravitas.com or directly in our website www.guitargravitas.com.
us.description:
Learn Guitar. Guitar Chords & Scales Libraries, Lessons, Backing Tracks, Tuner, Metronome and much more.

Guitar Gravitas is an inspirational tool for guitar players of all levels (beginner to pro) that offers the most comprehensive, advanced and interactive chord, arpeggio and scale library in the App Store.

• Over 200 chord types including not only a library of 15,000 of the most commonly used chord shapes but also MILLIONS of playable shapes generated by a state-of-the-art algorithm that allows you to select the root note of the chord and also the lowest or highest note.

• Thousands of arpeggios patterns generated on selection from a list of more than 200 chord types.

• Over 1000 different scales from all over the world including thousands of patterns.

• 31 videos with Guitar Lessons, Backing tracks, Tutorials and Support documents on PDF format.

• High Precision Guitar Tuner.

• Metronome.

• More than 200 predefined guitar tunings and the possibility to create your own. 

• Interact to listen to how chords, arpeggios and scales sound.

• :. Guitar Gravitas .: also comes with chord, arpeggio and scale finders where you can select notes on the fretboard and find out what what you are playing is called.

• No matter what chord, arpeggio or scale you are checking out, :. Guitar Gravitas .: allows you to know what chords, arpeggios or scales you could combine it with.


Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

us.description:
电视剧热播：
《长安的荔枝》古代传奇大剧！雷佳音岳云鹏喜感郎舅大唐“荔”劫运荔枝
《绽放的许开心》反内耗极品爽剧！张雨绮韩庚半熟烈爱带娃试婚
《潜渊》多重身份连环迷局！黄晓明张佳宁暗夜潜伏上演谍战大戏
《焕羽》张婧仪周翊然青春之旅蜕变成长，踏浪逐风恣意翱翔！
《桃花映江山》刘学义孟子义互虐生情，落魄公主敌国和亲，攻心猎爱震荡朝堂！
《淬火年代》大江大河姊妹篇！张新成宋祖儿热血办厂逆袭，正午阳光年代剧上新
《陷入我们的热恋》现偶之光顶级上头！刘浩存王安宇要谈不谈得暧昧最撩人
《紫川之光明王》壮丽诗史！杨旭文刘宇宁张铭恩三兄弟热血燃战
综艺强档：
《让我来唱》天后萧亚轩复出首秀，史上最卷“全女声”音综重磅来袭，66人直播大战一触即发！
《哈哈哈哈哈 第5季》“舞王”邓超遇对手！王俊凯大跳抽象甩葱舞，这互联网是没他在乎的人了吗？
《开始推理吧 第3季》推理团徒手抓“丧尸”，演绎现实版生化危机，谁看了不说一句有极限逃生那味儿了。

Learn Guitar. Guitar Chords & Scales Libraries, Lessons, Backing Tracks, Tuner, Metronome and much more.

Guitar Gravitas is an inspirational tool for guitar players of all levels (beginner to pro) that offers the most comprehensive, advanced and interactive chord, arpeggio and scale library in the App Store.

• Over 200 chord types including not only a library of 15,000 of the most commonly used chord shapes but also MILLIONS of playable shapes generated by a state-of-the-art algorithm that allows you to select the root note of the chord and also the lowest or highest note.

• Thousands of arpeggios patterns generated on selection from a list of more than 200 chord types.

• Over 1000 different scales from all over the world including thousands of patterns.

• 31 videos with Guitar Lessons, Backing tracks, Tutorials and Support documents on PDF format.

• High Precision Guitar Tuner.

• Metronome.

• More than 200 predefined guitar tunings and the possibility to create your own. 

• Interact to listen to how chords, arpeggios and scales sound.

• :. Guitar Gravitas .: also comes with chord, arpeggio and scale finders where you can select notes on the fretboard and find out what what you are playing is called.

• No matter what chord, arpeggio or scale you are checking out, :. Guitar Gravitas .: allows you to know what chords, arpeggios or scales you could combine it with.

us.description:
TextSniper is an easy-to-use desktop Mac OCR app that can extract and recognize any non-searchable and non-editable text on your Mac's screen. As an extra feature, it can turn OCR text into speech. It is a super convenient alternative to complicated optical character recognition tools.

The tool is intuitive to use and makes extracting text from your images, scanned paper documents, PDFs, or even videos easy. No training or special skills are required, and it fits perfectly home and business Mac users. Easily accessible from the menu bar whenever you need it and has a simple user interface. 

If you have used a built-in Mac screen capture application before, it wouldn't be any trouble to work with TextSniper, too. Select with a mouse any part of an image, photo, PDF document, or anything on your screen, and the app will process and recognize any text within this selection. The text output will be saved into a clipboard so you can paste it into your favourite macOS text editing or note-taking software. 

Finally, the app's optical character recognition engine doesn't need an internet connection to process documents. Great OCR solution for those who are concerned about privacy. The application does not collect any users' data.

Use Cases:
• Convert different image formats to text (JPEG, PNG, GIF, TIFF, BMP, etc.).
• Pull text from a non-searchable PDF file without a need to process the whole document.
• Read text from images, PDF documents, photos, Zoom meetings, or any other sources.
• Copy text even when it is uncopiable, like in ebooks or web articles.
• Quickly extract emails, links, phone numbers, etc.
• Grab text or turn it into speech in video games.
• Read QR or barcodes.
• Quickly generate alt text from the screenshot for tweets.

Features:
• On-device OCR technology. No internet connection is needed.
• Instant text recognition. No need to upload files into the application. OCR document or file on the fly.
• High accuracy and performance in processing any documents.
• Recognizes even tiny text on images with low-quality or dense background.
• Customizable. Custom keyboard shortcuts to extract text with various options.
• You can have TextSniper speak the recognized text whenever you need it.
• Supports optical character recognition in multiple languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Italian,  Traditional and Simplified Chinese.
• Running macOS Ventura: All the above languages plus Ukrainian, Korean, Japanese and Russian.
• Running macOS Sonoma: All the above languages plus Thai and Vietnamese.
• Running macOS Sequoia: All the above languages plus Arabic and Najdi Arabic.
• Running macOS Catalina: English language only supported.
• Use your iPad or iPhone camera to capture text from a photo or scanned document quickly.
• Fully compatible with macOS Sonoma and optimised for Apple's M1-M3 chips.
